mapper.select: SELECT QRTZ_TRIGGERS.SCHED_NAME,QRTZ_TRIGGERS.JOB_NAME,QRTZ_TRIGGERS.JOB_GROUP,QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.DESCRIPTION,JOB_CLASS_NAME,IS_DURABLE, IS_NONCONCURRENT,IS_UPDATE_DATA,REQUESTS_RECOVERY,QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_DATA,CRON_EXPRESSION,TRIGGER_STATE FROM QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS LEFT JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS ON QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME = QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP = QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.SCHED_NAME = QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.SCHED_NAME LEFT JOIN QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS ON QRTZ_TRIGGERS.JOB_NAME = QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_NAME AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.JOB_GROUP = QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_GROUP AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.SCHED_NAME = QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.SCHED_NAME WHERE QRTZ_TRIGGERS.SCHED_NAME = #{schedName} AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.JOB_NAME = #{jobName} AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup}

SELECT PAUSED_DATE_ID,SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY_JOB.SCHED_NAME,SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY_JOB.TRIGGER_GROUP, SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY_JOB.TRIGGER_NAME,SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY_JOB.JOB_GROUP,SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY_JOB.JOB_NAME, STRATEGY_NAME,START_PAUSED_DATE,END_PAUSED_DATE,STRATEGY FROM SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY_JOB INNER JOIN SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY ON SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY_JOB.PAUSED_DATE_ID = SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY.ID AND SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY_JOB.SCHED_NAME = SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY.SCHED_NAME WHERE SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY_JOB.SCHED_NAME = #{schedName} AND JOB_NAME = #{jobName} AND SPDB_PAUSED_STRATEGY_JOB.JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup}

SELECT qrtzTrigger.SCHED_NAME,qrtzTrigger.TRIGGER_NAME,qrtzTrigger.TRIGGER_GROUP,qrtzTrigger.JOB_NAME,qrtzTrigger.JOB_GROUP, qrtzTrigger.NEXT_FIRE_TIME,qrtzTrigger.PREV_FIRE_TIME,PRIORITY, qrtzTrigger.TRIGGER_STATE,qrtzTrigger.TRIGGER_TYPE,qrtzTrigger.START_TIME,qrtzTrigger.END_TIME,qrtzTrigger.CALENDAR_NAME, qrtzTrigger.MISFIRE_INSTR,qrtzTrigger.JOB_DATA AS TRIGGER_JOB_DATA,cronTrigger.CRON_EXPRESSION,cronTrigger.TIME_ZONE_ID, jobDetails.JOB_CLASS_NAME,jobDetails.DESCRIPTION,jobDetails.JOB_DATA FROM QRTZ_TRIGGERS qrtzTrigger LEFT JOIN QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS cronTrigger ON qrtzTrigger.TRIGGER_NAME = cronTrigger.TRIGGER_NAME AND qrtzTrigger.TRIGGER_GROUP = cronTrigger.TRIGGER_GROUP AND qrtzTrigger.SCHED_NAME = cronTrigger.SCHED_NAME LEFT JOIN QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS jobDetails ON qrtzTrigger.JOB_NAME = jobDetails.JOB_NAME AND qrtzTrigger.JOB_GROUP = jobDetails.JOB_GROUP AND qrtzTrigger.SCHED_NAME = jobDetails.SCHED_NAME WHERE qrtzTrigger.SCHED_NAME = #{schedName} AND qrtzTrigger.TRIGGER_NAME = #{triggerName} AND qrtzTrigger.TRIGGER_GROUP = #{triggerGroup} AND qrtzTrigger.JOB_NAME = #{jobName} AND qrtzTrigger.JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup} AND qrtzTrigger.TRIGGER_TYPE = #{triggerType} AND jobDetails.DESCRIPTION like concat(concat('%',#{description}),'%') OR jobDetails.JOB_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{description}),'%')
